summary: ENB with my custom settings. Using v250 ENB. Lens effects, Myst, Sun rays and other effects. DDOF and SSAO off.
descriptionHtml:
This ENB just my long experiments with ingame graphics that it was look like i want. Nothing espesial. Only my preferences - many small tweaks to fx-files and my own settings for enbseries.ini and enblocal.ini
This ENB have effects:
- Sun rays
- Sun glares
- Smooth shadows
- Edge AA
- Water effects
- Clouds shadows
- Myst effect
- Dirt and Anamorphic Lens Flare
- Enhanced Night Eye effect (Thanks to scegielski)
DDOF have right settings but it off for better perfomance. You can turn it on if you want.
I get something from Enhanced ENB Night Eye, Lens Textures for ENB, Post-Process Effects Addon for ENB.
My recommendation to use this ENB with Climates of Tamriel and ELFX.

Installation:
1) Download [url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0250.htm]v250 ENB[/url] than unpack only "d3d9.dll" and "enbhost.exe" from archive and paste to your Skyrim folder.
2) Download my ENB and unpack files from "Soft ENB" folder to your Skyrim folder.
3) Play ^_^

Thanks to all who get significantly contribute to enchance ENB.
Sorry if i miss something or someone. This is my second file on this site and my English not so well. :)
author: Galilist
